card.name: Grunt, the Triumph of Steel
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample Whenever you cast a spell with mana value greater than Grunt, the Triumph of Steel's power, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: The Stale Crow
card.text: Menace Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay 1 life. If you do, untap target nonland permanent you control.

card.name: Maegathrax, South of Heaven
card.text: Flying When Maegathrax, South of Heaven enters the battlefield, you may pay X life. If you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Thrash (Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, trigger its enters the battlefield ability.)

card.name: Church in Flames
card.text: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains helvete until end of turn. The helvete cost is equal to its mana cost. Create a 2/2 red and green Elf creature token. Helvete {3}{R}{G} (You may cast this from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying its helvete cost reduced by that creature's power. Then exile it.)

card.name: A Saucerful of Secrets
card.text: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control resolves, you may shred it. (To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: The Toys Go Winding Down
card.text: Return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with two stun counters on it. It loses all abilities until your next turn. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Lieve, Black Metal Witch
card.text: [+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Then if you discarded a nonland card this way, create a tapped Treasure token. [-2]: Choose target creature, instant, or sorcery card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. [-4]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life."

card.name: Per Oyst the Dead
card.text: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has helvete. The helvete cost is equal to that card's mana cost. (You may cast those cards from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying the helvete cost reduced by that creature's mana cost. If you cast a spell this way, exile it when it resolves.)

card.name: Wayk, The Crimson King
card.text: When Wayk, The Crimson King enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X nonland cards with mana value X or less, shred them, then shuffle. (To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Obscured by Clouds
card.text: At the beginning of combat on each player's turn, that player may shred a nonland permanent they control. If that player doesn't, they can't attack you this turn. (To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: The Air is Getting Slippery
card.text: Target player exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the greatest mana value among creatures you control. You draw a card for each card type among cards exiled this way.

card.name: Frayed End of Sanity
card.text: When Frayed End of Sanity enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target opponent unless they discard two cards. Thrash (Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, trigger its enters the battlefield ability. If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Avenger of Oronimos
card.text: Whenever Avenger of Oronimos deals combat damage to a player, it deals damage equal to its power to any other target.

card.name: Redeemer of Souls
card.text: Vigilance Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature you control with the least power.

card.name: Chord of Valor
card.text: {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Put a +1/+1 counter on Chord of Valor. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Chord of Valor become a 0/0 Avatar creature with shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Last Cup of Sorrow
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add {R}. Activate only if you control a Mountain or a Forest.

card.name: Paths of Glory
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. {T}: Add {W}. Activate only if you control a Plains or an Island.

card.text: {T}: Add {B}. {T}: Add {U}. Activate only if you control an Island or a Swamp.

card.name: Sol Invictus
card.text: {T}: Add {W}. {T}: Add {G}. Activate only if you control a Forest or a Plains.

card.text: Target nonland permanent's owner shreds it. (To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.")

card.text: {W}{U} CHURCH OF SHRED Enjoy the noodling prog lines as your shredded sagas tick down. {U}{B} DARK DRUDGE Take your time as grunge beasts slowly wake from slumber. {B}{R} THRASH HALLS Be aggressive. Your creatures can repeat their enter triggers on attack for added metal. {R}{G} KVLT HELLS The true masters of black metal trade creatures to recast spells. {G}{W} METAL MOUNT The call of real metal echoes loudly and demands your strongest creatures. {W}{B} MORBID Permanents leaving the battlefield under your control enhances your plan. {B}{G} TAPPED CREATURES Slumbering, alchemical, thrashing or otherwise, your tapped creatures all matter. {G}{U} FEROCIOUS Power 4 or greater is the key to metal madness. {U}{R} COUNTERS Lore and stun counters—Hate to see them go, love to watch them leave. {R}{W} PARADOX Shredded cards and helvete spells help you to cast from outside of your hand.

card.name: Maegathrax South of Heaven (bundle promo)
card.text: Flying When Maegathrax, South of Heaven enters the battlefield, you may pay X life. If you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Thrash

card.name: Lieve, Black Metal Witch HVY
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life.
